comments.en:
This is a multifunction device with integrated scanner/copier. Scanning is not supported by free software, copying works without PC interaction, and printing (standard 4-colour or bw, not 6-colour photo) works with drivers for the Lexmark Z51 because the printing engine is the same as for the Z51. Lexmark does not provide any drivers for free operating systems. USB and parallel connection.

Consumables/Refills: color + black or color + photo ink cartridge
